name: BuzzMyVideos YouTube Network
description: We Grow Talents & Formats on YouTube!
overview:
BuzzMyVideos Ltd. is a global network empowering creative & talented online content producers with worldwide content distribution, cross-promotion & revenue generation through YouTube and other online platforms.

The company was founded by Paola Marinone, who has previously worked for more than 5 years in Google and YouTube across Europe and America.

We buzz the next generation of content creators & rights owners by helping them sustain a loyal audience on the web & generate revenue off of the content that they produce.

BuzzMyVideos is a UK based company, though we believe there are no borders in our operations, as our main strategy is to connect the video producers and creators globally though our extensive online video expertise & the power of our network.
